full_text: 07/15/2005 15:43 5613557281 SUE PAGE 02 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: Pursuant to an official investigation of a suspected felony being conducted by Detective Michelle D. Pagan, it is requested that your company furnish PLEASE SEE ATTACHED YOU ARE NOT TO DISCLOSE THE EXISTENCE OF THIS REQUEST. PRESTON MIGHDOLL ASSISTANT STATE ATTORNEY 07/26/17 Page 2 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031619
